Lucfreelance

Web / app developer

Hello! I'm a frontend web developer. I'm capable to build modern JavaScript web / app designs. Start a conversation (English, Spanish) if you need since a lines of code until some dedicated digital request on PERNstack and JAMstack; also frameworks like Astro, Vite, Elevently, Bootstrap, Jekyll and, why not, vanilla. Besides database, testing, integrations and more… I feel confortable with remote work.
